content:
The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 16.03.24 is approximately:

  • personnel - -429580 (+1160) persons liquidated
  • tanks -6779 (+21)
  • combat armored vehicles -12973  (+24)
  • Artillery systems -10606 (+26)
  • RSZV -1017 (0)
  • air defense means -719 (+2)
  • aircraft -347 (0)
  • Helicopters -325 (0)
  • UAV of the operative-tactical level-8268 (+14)
  • Winged rockets -1922 (+2)
  • ships / boats -26 (0)
  • submarines -1 (0)
  • Automobile equipment and tanks -14024 (+31)
  • Special technique -1712 (+1)

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source:The General Staff of the Armed Forces of UkraineAs of April 15, 24.
title: RF loss per day: minus 1160 invaders, 24 BBM and 26 Artisystems
author: Army Inform
